description: An application submitted under Section 96a of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a non-material amendment in connection with the planning permission (DC/21/120262) dated 15 February 2023, in order to allow change of development description from : "Demolition of existing buildings on site and the construction of a 5-storey building (plus lower ground) consisting of 5 x three bedroom, 8 x two bedroom and 2 x one bedroom self-contained dwellings at the site known as Hesper House, Wells Park Road, SE26, incorporating 6 off-street parking spaces, together with associated landscaping and refuse and cycle parking facilities" to:  "Demolition of existing buildings on site and the construction of a 5-storey building (plus lower ground) consisting of self-contained dwellings at the site known as Hesper House, Wells Park Road, SE26, incorporating off-street parking spaces, together with associated landscaping and refuse and cycle parking facilities" at Hesper House Wells Park Road SE26, in order to allow:- Amendment to description of development to remove the specific reference to number of residential units (and to add a new Condition - quantum of development) and to remove specific reference to number of car parking numbers at Hesper House Wells Park Road SE26.
site_name: HESPER HOUSE, WELLS PARK ROAD, LONDON, SE26 6RQ
